name: Hentai school life / 诱惑学园
name_original: Hentai school life / 诱惑学园
description:
Stepping into the new semester, the top-ranking prostitute, Xiao Bai, lived in the parents' expectations from the moment of writing. On the first day of the new semester, an accidental wardrobe malfunction made her to taste the other kind of pleasure, and Xiaobai also produced a different kind of promise to become "self". During the game, the player will balance the choice between rules and temptations with Xiaobai... Then, if you are really the bright summer flower under the spotlight, what kind of gorgeous music will be performed?


Players will experience the campus life in the game, the new dressing system and the upcoming Chinese dubbing will greatly enrich and satisfy the different sensory experiences of the players in the game.

Players will choose different directions to make their own physical, artistic, technical, technical and speciality growth, in the meanwhile use their leisure time to earn money to buy the one they are eager to wear at the end of the year, A blue dress...

After a short semester, the game will produce a completely 6 different endings based on the above data. to be a sportsman to enhance his physique, or to be an art singer to increase his or her own specialty, or make a plan of being Models, all of these will be on your decision.


[special of this work]
Each dress has a independent dressing element
Chinese dubbing of events will be carried out in future updates
There are 6 different endings depending on the player's choice
